name: Save the Aliens
description:
I would recommend downloading the executables instead of playing the html5 version, as the browser version seems to run faster for some reason.

Top-down brawling game with a poorly conceived theme about saving your alien girlfriend from the CIA. Controls are WASD to move, E to heal, and Mouse to attack. Also supports a gamepad, with left stick to move, right stick to attack, and action button to heal.
